items.sentence: Tom took Mary\'s hands and held them tightly.
I thought that you were able to speak French.
I thought the company had sent Tom to Boston.
I thought you and Tom were dating each other.
I thought you enjoyed talking about baseball.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all live in Boston.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice came here together.
Tom doesn\'t know anything about electronics.
Tom doesn\'t let Mary go shopping by herself.
Tom doesn\'t really care if his car is dirty.
Tom doesn\'t speak French as fluently as you.
If we\'d taken that plane, we\'d be dead now.
There\'s no point in getting upset over this.
There\'s not enough space here for 40 people.
I wonder why the police didn\'t find the gun.
I would hate to be in Tom\'s shoes right now.
I\'d like it if you would cook dinner for me.
I suppose we could try to find Tom ourselves.
I suppose you want to ask Tom some questions.
We have to just keep doing what we\'re doing.
